title: Experienced Appointment Setter – Credit Repair (GoHighLevel + Sales)
job_overview:
Full-Time (Remote)
Work Hours: U.S. Business Hours (CST Preferred)
Description:
We’re looking for a highly motivated and experienced appointment setter to join our fast-growing credit development consulting business. This is NOT a beginner position. You must have proven experience in the credit repair industry, know how to work leads, and be able to close appointments consistently.

Responsibilities:
 • Set qualified appointments with potential clients from inbound/outbound leads
 • Use GoHighLevel CRM to manage pipelines, conversations, and follow-ups
 • Respond to leads quickly, effectively, and professionally
 • Overcome objections and build value in our services
 • Follow scripts and adapt to client needs and pain points
 • Book calls directly into the CEO’s calendar
 • Maintain daily/weekly KPI reporting

Requirements:
 • At least 1 year of experience setting appointments in the credit repair industry
 • Knowledge of GoHighLevel, SMS/email automation, and pipeline management
 • Strong English communication skills – both written and verbal
 • High confidence and energy on the phone
 • Able to follow directions, hit goals, and work independently
 • Experience closing warm leads is a huge plus

Tools You Must Know or Be Willing to Learn:
 • GoHighLevel
 • Google Workspace
 • Slack or WhatsApp (for team communication)

Perks:
 • Long-term position with growth opportunities
 • Performance-based bonuses
 • Supportive team culture
 • Weekly pay (via Wise/PayPal)

How to Apply:
Send the following:
 1. Resume with relevant experience
 2. Voice recording introducing yourself
 3. Screenshots or samples of past appointment setting KPIs (if available)
 4. Your expected monthly salary in USD

We’re only looking for rockstars who are ready to grow with a serious company that’s helping people transform their financial futures. If that’s you, we want to hear from you!
